avalancheActivity.comment: A small slab avalanche released in Esjan, probably the night before Saturday 21.12. It ran over the hiking patch just before Steinn.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Updated 21.12 at 11:20: There is little snow in the area. Small, layered slabs may exist in gullies and other places where snow has accumulated. Small wet sluffs might release in thaw on Monday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The mountains are white, but there is still not much snow. Small, layered slabs may exist in gullies and other places where snow has accumulated. Small wet sluffs may release on Monday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar éljagangur um helgina, frost og breytilegur vindur. Á mánudag (Þorláksmessu) er von á skammvinnri lægð með hláku, rigningu og SA-SV hvassviðri. Líklega snjóar til fjalla um tíma.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is little snow in the area, but small unstable slabs might exist in steep terrain due to N-NE snowfall and snowdrift.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most snow in the area melted in thaw on 8.12. Since then, there has been some snowfall, but there is still not much snow in the mountains. Small, layered slabs may exist in gullies and other places where snow has accumulated, especially in south and west facing slopes. On Monday, a short-lived thaw is expected and then, small wet avalanches might release.

travelAdvisory.comment: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.

weatherForecast.highlights: Dálítill éljagangur og skafrenningur á laugardag í N-NA áttum. Smáél á sunnudag í SV átt. Á mánudag (Þorláksmessu) er von á lægð með skammvinnri hláku og SA-SV hvassviðri, rigningu á láglendi en væntanlega snjókomu eða slyddu til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area. Windslabs could be present, especially in gullies and bowls.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some new snow is in the area. Windslabs could be present, especially in gullies and bowls. It will snow over the weekend and but a thaw on Monday increases risk of wet avalanches.

travelAdvisory.comment: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á laugardag snýst í NV-átt með snjókomu. Suðlæg átt á sunnudag og úrkomulítið. Á mánudag hlánar um tíma.

avalancheActivity.highlights: It snowed on Friday and wind slabs could have formed at high elevations. Strong NW-wind over the weekend could form wind slabs. Thow on Monday but snow at high elelvations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed on Friday onto hard packed snow and small wind slabs could be present at high elevations. NW-erly winds will be dominant over the weekend, very strong wind at times, so wind slabs could form on SE-erly aspects. A thaw is forecasted on Monday which could lead to small wet avalanches.The old snow was stiff in most places but layered at high elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Generally there is little snow, but small slabs may exist in gullies and steep terrain. On Monday, small wet avalanches might release due to thaw.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hægviðri á laugardag en hvöss norðvestlæg átt um kvöldið og líkur á dálítilli snjókomu. Lægir og styttir upp á sunnudag. Á mánudag er útlit fyrir hláku um stund, suðlæga átt með rigningu eða slyddu en líklega snjókomu til fjalla.
